meta.title: About | Kris French Web Development
meta.description: Learn more about Kris French, a freelance web developer based in Zushi, specializing in modern, bilingual websites for a variety of clients, with a focus on local businesses in the Zushi, Hayama, and Kamakura area.

bio.heading: Who I Am
bio.body: I am a freelance web developer based in Zushi, Japan, with a passion for creating fast, accessible, and visually appealing websites. I work with a variety of clients but have a strong focus on helping local businesses in Zushi, Hayama, and Kamakura expand their reach through bilingual websites that cater to both English and Japanese audiences.

skills.heading: Skills and Expertise
items: Performance optimization and SEO best practices

whyHireMe.heading: Why Work With Me
whyHireMe.body: I understand the needs of businesses across different markets and the importance of building a website that represents your brand accurately in both languages. I combine technical expertise with clear communication and a dedication to delivering projects on time and on budget.

cta.heading: Let Us Work Together
cta.body: I would be happy to discuss how I can help you create a website that supports your business goals.
